title: Enhancing Practical Programming Competencies: PBL Mathematics Project for Strengthening Novice Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical computation skills and experience in solving everyday problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world applied math problems with over 80% accuracy.
Through team-based PBL activities, learners design and execute problem-solving strategies at least three times.
While exchanging feedback with peers, learners can document the problem-solving process in a structured format of at least three stages.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
